name: Bong!
description:
Bong game is a modern version of a classic arcade video game, popular in the 70s. It is a tennis sports game featuring simple two-dimensional graphics. Goal of the game is to keep the ball within your screen as long as possible!

Kids and people of all ages love playing Bong! Try it for yourself and you will love it!

***Game Features***
- Single player
- Intuitive and precise controls.
- Great sound, visual and haptic touch effects.
- Integrated Google Leaderboard and Achievements.
- hours of fun for you, your kids, friends and relatives.
- perfect for wasting time while on the way to school or work.
- kids love it and keeps them occupied for hours!
